subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just A Little Spoiled
author: RetroCom
full_text:
I'm around, not much spare time for posting. Nice to see how this group has grown and all the activity.

Dave

--- paranormalinvestigating@hotmail.com wrote:

From: bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@hotmail.com>
To: <evp-itc@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just A Little Spoiled
Date: Tue, 29 Jan 2008 11:41:03 -0500


Hey Dave, where the heck ya been????
 
bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: vfp19968@retrocom.comDate: Tue, 29 Jan 2008 07:18:01 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just A Little Spoiled




http://etheric-studies.aaevp.com/best_practices_development/index.php?title=Locating_EVP_formation_and_detecting_false_positives--- vfp19968@retrocom.com wrote:From: " RetroCom" <vfp19968@retrocom.com>To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just A Little SpoiledDate: Tue, 29 Jan 2008 07:15:10 -0800Actually, the forum there is pretty active. I found the link I had mentioned. I'm sure this will not be 'clickable' because the link is too long for Yahoo posts like this one. You may have to cut and paste this into a browser. The title may come off sounding a bit negative, don't shoot the messanger :-).http://etheric-studies.aaevp.com/best_practices_development/index.phptitle=Locating_EVP_formation_and_detecting_false_positivesDave--- lisby@earthlink.net wrote:From: "lisbyfarrum" <lisby@earthlink.net>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comSubject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just A Little SpoiledDate: Tue, 29 Jan 2008 15:00:02 -0000Well, I'm glad to hear it, but as of last week, the leaders wereunreceptive to the idea that this phenomenon was real.Ann--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, " RetroCom" <vfp19968@...> wrote:>> There is a radio sweep forum on AA-EVP for members. They have alsocreated an Etheric studies wiki that mentions Frank's Box and the MiniBox. I'll see if I can find the link for this, it is accessable by thepublic.> > Dave> > --- lisby@... wrote:> > From: Lisby <lisby@...>> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Just A Little Spoiled> Date: Tue, 29 Jan 2008 04:45:55 -0500> > Very interested. And I agree with you about the overnight change. > Orgs like AA-EVP that aren't dealing with the boxes are missing the > boat.> > Ann> > On Jan 28, 2008, at 8:48 PM, Jules wrote:> > > Well guys, I have to tell you that since I started box sessions in> > November I have become so spoiled that conventional EVP just don't do> > it for me.> >> > My organization was asked to come and do an investigation at a very> > historial place (here in Illinois). The owner of this home asked if I> > would bring one of the boxes to the home (he is amazed with the> > immediately 2 way communication). So upon respectfully asking my tec> > if it was alright to do a session outside the my home we did several> > box sessions along with conventional EVP. We wanted to see if we could> > discover some unanswered history about the residence, and the > > otherside> > was more than willing to comply.> >> > I have to tell you that the regular EVP recordings were and are the> > most boring data to review. Something I use to love so much has> > actually turned into a project given I am waiting for a response> > immediately! Too funny how things can change overnight!> >> > I will be uploading some files for these sessions if you are > > interested.> >> > Juli> >> >> >>
